sqlMap.select: SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, ORGNA_ID AS ORGNAID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, USER_ORDER AS USERORDER, USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, REAL_NAME AS REALNAME, SEX AS SEX, AGE AS AGE, MOBILE AS MOBILE, PHONE AS PHONE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, USER_DESC AS USERDESC FROM C_USER T ORDER BY T.USER_NAME

SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, ORGNA_ID AS ORGNAID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, USER_ORDER AS USERORDER, USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, REAL_NAME AS REALNAME, SEX AS SEX, AGE AS AGE, MOBILE AS MOBILE, PHONE AS PHONE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, USER_DESC AS USERDESC FROM C_USER T where t.orgna_id = '371' ORDER BY T.Real_Name

SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, ORGNA_ID AS ORGNAID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, USER_ORDER AS USERORDER, USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, REAL_NAME AS REALNAME, SEX AS SEX, AGE AS AGE, MOBILE AS MOBILE, PHONE AS PHONE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, USER_DESC AS USERDESC FROM C_USER T WHERE T.USER_NAME = #value# AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, ORGNA_ID AS ORGNAID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, USER_ORDER AS USERORDER, USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, REAL_NAME AS REALNAME, SEX AS SEX, AGE AS AGE, MOBILE AS MOBILE, PHONE AS PHONE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, USER_DESC AS USERDESC FROM C_USER T WHERE T.User_Id = #value#

SELECT T.USER_ID AS USERID, T.ORGNA_ID AS ORGNAID, T.USER_NAME AS USERNAME, T.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, T.USER_ORDER AS USERORDER, T.USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, T.REAL_NAME AS REALNAME, T.SEX AS SEX, T.AGE AS AGE, T.MOBILE AS MOBILE, T.PHONE AS PHONE, T.EMAIL AS EMAIL, T.USER_DESC AS USERDESC FROM C_USER T, C_USERROLE UR WHERE T.USER_ID = UR.USER_ID AND UR.ROLE_ID = #value#

SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, ORGNA_ID AS ORGNAID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, USER_ORDER AS USERORDER, USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, REAL_NAME AS REALNAME, SEX AS SEX, AGE AS AGE, MOBILE AS MOBILE, PHONE AS PHONE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, USER_DESC AS USERDESC FROM C_USER T WHERE T.ORGNA_ID = #value#

SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM C_RESOURCE A, C_RELATION B WHERE A.RES_ID = B.RES_ID AND (B.USER_ID = #userid# OR (B.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM C_USERROLE, C_USER WHERE C_USERROLE.USER_ID = #userid#))) AND PARENT_ID = #parentid# ORDER BY RES_ORDER

SELECT T.*, LEVEL FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM U_RESOURCE A, U_RELATION B WHERE A.RES_ID = B.RES_ID AND (B.USER_ID = #userid# OR (B.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM U_USER_ROLE, U_USER WHERE U_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = #userid#)) OR B.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT U_R_ROLE_ID FROM U_ROLE_PARENT START WITH ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM U_USER_ROLE, U_USER WHERE U_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = #userid#) CONNECT BY PRIOR U_R_ROLE_ID = ROLE_ID))) T START WITH RES_ID IN (SELECT RES_ID FROM U_RESOURCE WHERE PARENT_ID = #root#) CONNECT BY PRIOR RES_ID = PARENT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY RES_ORDER
SELECT T.* FROM C_MENU T

SELECT A.*, B.CN FROM C_ORGNIZATION A, (SELECT T.PARENT_ID, COUNT(T.ORGNA_ID) CN FROM C_ORGNIZATION T GROUP BY T.PARENT_ID) B WHERE A.ORGNA_ID = B.PARENT_ID(+) AND A.PARENT_ID = #value# ORDER BY A.ORGNA_ORDER
SELECT T.* FROM C_RESOURCE T ORDER BY T.PARENT_ID,T.RES_ORDER

sqlMap.select: SELECT LPAD(' ', (LEVEL - 1) * 4, '┊ ') || '┣' || ORGNA_NAME ORGNA_NAME, ORGNA_ID, ORGNA_ORDER, ORGNA_MEMO, PARENT_ID FROM C_ORGNIZATION START WITH ORGNA_ID = '1' CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGNA_ID = PARENT_ID order siblings by ORGNA_ORDER
SELECT T.RES_ID FROM C_RELATION T WHERE T.ROLE_ID = #value#

SELECT R.* FROM C_RESOURCE R, (select distinct t.res_id from C_RELATION T, C_USERROLE U where T.ROLE_ID = U.ROLE_ID and U.USER_ID = #userId#) P WHERE P.RES_ID = R.RES_ID AND R.PARENT_ID = #parentId# ORDER BY R.RES_ORDER
